# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 0.1.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 0.1.0 | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take security seriously. If you discover a security vulnerability, please do NOT open a public issue. Instead, please report it via one of the following methods:

- **Email**: security@randi-agent.org
- **Discord**: DM a moderator in the security channel.

We will acknowledge your report within 48 hours and provide a timeline for a fix.
